pre_caption: This is a static scenery shot of a street, likely in the French Quarter of New Orleans, on an overcast day. The camera remains completely still throughout the clip. There is no discernible movement from any of the subjects in the frame, including the parked cars and flags.
pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
original_caption: This is a static scenery shot of a street, likely in the French Quarter of New Orleans, on an overcast day. The camera remains completely still throughout the clip. There is no discernible movement from any of the subjects in the frame, including the parked cars and flags.
initial_feedback:
1. Avoid saying "static" or "completely still" as the camera does shake a slight amount over the course of the video. 
2. There is in fact movement. The flags wave slightly in the wind, red and blue lights flash from underneat the headlights of two police vehicles on the left side of the street, and a pedestrian walks rightwards in the middleground.
